mapper.sql: SELECT t.claim_calc_grain_unseeded_guid, t.claim_calculation_guid, t.insured_acres, t.less_adjustment_acres, t.adjusted_acres, t.deductible_level, t.deductible_acres, t.max_eligible_acres, t.insurable_value, t.coverage_value, t.unseeded_acres, t.less_assessment_acres, t.eligible_unseeded_acres, t.revision_count, t.create_user, t.create_date, t.update_user, t.update_date
mapper.insert:
select replace(cast(gen_random_uuid() as text), '-', '')
INSERT INTO claim_calculation_grain_unseeded ( claim_calc_grain_unseeded_guid, claim_calculation_guid, insured_acres, less_adjustment_acres, adjusted_acres, deductible_level, deductible_acres, max_eligible_acres, insurable_value, coverage_value, unseeded_acres, less_assessment_acres, eligible_unseeded_acres, revision_count, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date ) VALUES ( #{claimCalculationGrainUnseededGuid}, #{dto.claimCalculationGuid, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.insuredAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.lessAdjustmentAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.adjustedAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.deductibleLevel, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.deductibleAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.maxEligibleAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.insurableValue, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.coverageValue, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.unseededAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.lessAssessmentAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.eligibleUnseededAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.revisionCount, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, now(), #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE claim_calculation_grain_unseeded SET insured_acres = #{dto.insuredAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, less_adjustment_acres = #{dto.lessAdjustmentAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, adjusted_acres = #{dto.adjustedAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, deductible_level = #{dto.deductibleLevel, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, deductible_acres = #{dto.deductibleAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, max_eligible_acres = #{dto.maxEligibleAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, insurable_value = #{dto.insurableValue, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, coverage_value = #{dto.coverageValue, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, unseeded_acres = #{dto.unseededAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, less_assessment_acres = #{dto.lessAssessmentAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, eligible_unseeded_acres = #{dto.eligibleUnseededAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, revision_count = revision_count + 1, update_user = #{dto.updateUser, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, update_date = now() WHERE claim_calc_grain_unseeded_guid = #{claimCalculationGrainUnseededGuid}
